metadata.title: CVE-2024-35906 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Send DTBCLK disable message on first commit[Why]Previous patch to allow DTBCLK disable didn't address boot case. Driverthinks DTBCLK is disabled by default, so we don't send disable message toPMFW. DTBCLK is then enabled at idle desktop on boot, burning power.[How]Set dtbclk_en to true on boot so that disable message is sent during firstcommit.
